sqlMap.statement: SELECT SYSCD AS "SYSCD" , SYSNAME AS "SYSNAME", SYSIP AS "SYSIP" , SYSPORT AS "SYSPORT" , USERID AS "USERID" , USERPASSWORD AS "USERPASSWORD" , SENDDIR AS "SENDDIR" , RECVDIR AS "RECVDIR" , SFTPYN AS "SFTPYN" , THISMSGUSEYN AS "THISMSGUSEYN" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ11 WHERE SysCd = #sysCd#
